name: beautyai-monorepo
description: BeautyAI Beauty Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o bin/server cmd/server/main.go
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && go vet ./... && go fmt ./...
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && go mod download && cd ../frontend && flutter pub get
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && go clean && rm -rf bin/

author: BeautyAI Team
